memberdef.argsstring: (data_type_tensor const &__data, bool const __newton_method, value_type const __tol, size_type const __max_steps)
memberdef.name: polar_decomposition_wrapper

briefdescription.para: Returns the orthogonal tensor $\SecondT{R}$ from the decomposition $\SecondT{F} = \SecondT{R}\SecondT{U}$.
Returns the symmetric tensor $\SecondT{U}$ from the decomposition $\SecondT{F} = \SecondT{R}\SecondT{U}$.
Returns the symmetric tensor $\SecondT{V}$ from the decomposition $\SecondT{F} = \SecondT{V}\SecondT{R}$.

detaileddescription.para: \[ \SecondT{R}^{k+1} = \left(\SecondT{R}^{k} + (\SecondT{R}^{k})^{-1}\right)\frac{1}{2}. \] A detailed describtion is given here.

briefdescription.para: Computes the right and left polar decomposition $\SecondT{F} = \SecondT{R}\SecondT{U} = \SecondT{V}\SecondT{R}$ of a real second order tensor.

parameterdescription.para: Tensor expression from which the polar decomposition should be determined.
